raw_body:
SENANAYAKE – MALATHI CHANDIMA – Beloved wife of Kirthi Senanayake, loving mother of Ruvini, Varuni & Rajika, mother-in-law of Dayal, Sheran & Hasantha, grandmother of Jithen & Nayanthara, Avanti, Kyasha & Dhiren. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour on Saturday 9th March 2024 from 9.30 a.m. onwards, cortege leaves Parlour at 2.30 p.m. on same day for Cremation at General Cemetery Borella at 3 p.m. (Old Crematorium).
017617
